summary: The customer contacted the Contoso Wireless customer service team about an issue with their Contoso Wireless Pro phone not connecting when making calls. The customer service agent asked for more information about the phone and the connection being attempted. After confirming the signal strength was fine, the agent suggested remotely accessing the device to take a closer look at the issue. The customer agreed and the agent instructed them to download a remote access software from the website so that they can investigate further.
